#### Addictive Effect Model (iid model)


$$
y_{i,j}=\mu+a_{i}+b_{j}+\epsilon_{i,j}
$$
- $a_i$: sender effect (row means of the sociomatrix),
- $b_j$: receiver effect (column means of the sociomatrix)
